data.comment: The match has started, with Nottingham kicking-off.
In the minute 46, QPR have kicked-off the second half at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
An attacking QPR player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Lyndon Dykes gives QPR the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
In the minute 56, Tobias Figueiredo (Nottingham) has received a first yellow card.
Sammy Ameobi is replacing Joe Lolley for Nottingham at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
Jordan Gabriel for Nottingham has been booked by Tim Robinson and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, Sabri Lamouchi (Nottingham) is making a first substitution, with Lyle Taylor replacing Nuno Da Costa.
Sabri Lamouchi is making the team's third substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Alexander Mighten replacing Luke Freeman.
The home team have replaced Tom Carroll with George Thomas. This is the first substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
In the minute 77, Lyndon Dykes is booked for the home team.
The home team have replaced Luke Amos with Dominic Ball. This is the second substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Mark Warburton is making the team's third substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Paul Smyth replacing Bright Osayi-Samuel.
Great finish from Ilias Chair to give QPR a 2-0 lead.
